dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, big news from Kazakhstan! The President, uh, just gave this amazing speech for International Women's Day, finally, really getting it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, big news from Kazakhstan! The President, uh, just gave this amazing speech for International Women's Day, finally, really getting it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A ceremonial meeting dedicated to International Women's Day is being held in Astana with the participation of the Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, according to a statement from Akorda. The President congratulated women on the holiday of March 8.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Getting what, A? Are we reading the same article? Because that speech was, like, a masterclass in missing the point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Getting what, A? Are we reading the same article? Because that speech was, like, a masterclass in missing the point.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What? No, he's, he's celebrating women! He said they're beautiful, uh, full of tenderness. What's wrong with that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? No, he's, he's celebrating women! He said they're beautiful, uh, full of tenderness. What's wrong with that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Of course, March 8 is a holiday that personifies beauty and tenderness. All these qualities are inherent in the beautiful half of humanity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, tenderness? Beauty? On International Women's Day? That's not a celebration; that's, like, a regression.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, tenderness? Beauty? On International Women's Day? That's not a celebration; that's, like, a regression.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But it's complimentary! He calls them the "beautiful half of humanity," um, "keepers of the hearth." That's powerful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's complimentary! He calls them the beautiful half of humanity, um, keepers of the hearth. That's powerful.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All these qualities are inherent in the beautiful half of humanity. ... The President noted that a woman is the keeper of the hearth, the soul of the nation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Powerful? He's reducing women to domestic roles, A! "Keeper of the hearth," "soul of the nation" because they raise children?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Powerful? He's reducing women to domestic roles, A! Keeper of the hearth, soul of the nation because they raise children?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted that a woman is the keeper of the hearth, the soul of the nation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's folk wisdom! "A woman rocks the cradle with one hand and the whole world with the other." That's, that's an acknowledgment of their strength.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's folk wisdom! A woman rocks the cradle with one hand and the whole world with the other. That's, that's an acknowledgment of their strength.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As folk wisdom says, ˜a woman rocks the cradle with one hand, and the whole world with the other,™" said the Head of State.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's an acknowledgment of their unpaid labor and emotional burden, dressed up as a compliment. It completely ignores women's economic and political contributions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's an acknowledgment of their unpaid labor and emotional burden, dressed up as a compliment. It completely ignores women's economic and political contributions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of the country noted that women work conscientiously in all areas, strengthening the potential and authority of Kazakhstan with their persistent and effective work.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He did mention they work conscientiously in all areas! It's, it's right there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did mention they work conscientiously in all areas! It's, it's right there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of the country noted that women work conscientiously in all areas, strengthening the potential and authority of Kazakhstan with their persistent and effective work.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: As an afterthought! After paragraph after paragraph of "gentle motherly hands" and preserving traditions. It's so, like, patronizing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: As an afterthought! After paragraph after paragraph of gentle motherly hands and preserving traditions. It's so, like, patronizing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Gentle motherly hands and boundless love warm every home. Mothers play an exceptional role in preserving national traditions and the native language.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I just think you're, um, overthinking it. It's a, a spring holiday. He's being respectful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I just think you're, um, overthinking it. It's a, a spring holiday. He's being respectful.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Respectful by telling women their primary value is their looks, their caring nature, and their ability to keep a home? That's not respect, that's, like, a gilded cage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Respectful by telling women their primary value is their looks, their caring nature, and their ability to keep a home? That's not respect, that's, like, a gilded cage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You really think he meant it, like, negatively? I, uh, I think he was genuinely trying to be warm.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You really think he meant it, like, negatively? I, uh, I think he was genuinely trying to be warm.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The road to hell, A, is paved with those kinds of intentions, especially when they completely undermine the actual fight for gender equality.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The road to hell, A, is paved with those kinds of intentions, especially when they completely undermine the actual fight for gender equality.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, so you think it's, um, insulting?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, so you think it's, um, insulting?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's insulting to the progress women have fought for, absolutely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's insulting to the progress women have fought for, absolutely.
